finance-manager.title: Finance Manager
description: Draft, prepare, and interpret reports, budget, accounts, comments, and financial report
Perform strategic analysis and assist the strategic planning
Control revenues, cash flow and expenses
Develop and manage the financial system/model
Conduct business modeling and risks analysis
Provide financial report and interpret the financial information to the managerial staffs as well as give recommendations in terms of the next action
Provide inputs and recommendation regarding investment activity, and adivse the strategy that the company needs to take
Maintain the organization's financial well-being
Make financial report regarding budgets, accounts payable, accounts receivable, expenses, etc
Review, supervise, and manage the budget
Develop strategies that will minimize financial risks
requirement: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Accounting and/Finance. Candidates with Master's Degree/Post Graduate Degree in Finance and Accounting are preferred
At least 3 to 4 years supervisory experience in the Accounting/Financial area.
Strong competency in Accounting and Financial, including Financial Statement, Tax, Ledger, Advance AR/AP, and such.
High ability to thrive in a fast-paced setting.
High attention to detail and accuracy.

river-debris.title: River Debris Field Officier
description: Perform on-ground sampling in several rivers in Jabodetabek
Input data on daily basis
Perform composition sampling
Coordinate with the project manager regarding technical issues, and reporting
requirement: At least a Final Year student from Environment/Marine Engineering
Good understanding of the pivot feature in Ms. Excel and Ms. Powerpoint
Have a personal vehicle (car/motorcycle) since the job will require high mobilization to several places
Have a personal laptop
Able to work in a team
Honest and is fully responsible for the sampling data

accounting-manager.title: Accounting Manager
description: Oversee, direct and review the daily operations of the finance team
Review daily journal entries and ensure posted journal entries are complete and accurate for Waste4Change Company.
Monitor and analyze accounting data and produce financial reports or reports for Waste4Change, shareholders, taxes, regulatory agencies, and other financial groups related to company finances
Establish and enforce appropriate accounting methods, policies and principles
Coordinate and complete annual audits
Improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective action
Oversee budget reports, budget preparation, and budget analysis
Provide advice on financial management and procedures and develop policies
Monitor debt aging and liquidity
Meet financial accounting objectives
requirement: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Master's Degree/Post Graduate Degree in Finance and Accounting
At least 3 to 4 years prior supervisory experience in the Accounting/Financial area.
Strong competency in Accounting and Financial, including Financial Statement, Tax, Ledger, Advance AR/AP, and such.
High ability to thrive in a fast-paced setting.
High attention to detail and accuracy.

hc-admin.title: HC Admin
description: Manage, update, and maintain employee database
Accommodate documents relating to human resources and perform filling for employees' data
Conduct activities with updated database and employee's administration procedure
Be involved in drafting and giving a warning letter, as well as regarding work termination
Assist employees during the off-boarding period (exit interview)
Perform internatl communication and socialize every company's regulations/SOP, etc
Perform payroll calculation
requirement: At least a Bachelor's Degree from Human Resources/Law
A minimum of 1-year experience in the same field
Understand about the Labor Law No.13 as well as the newest regulations
Have knowledge regarding human resources management/organizational operation/regulation structure
Good communication skills
Diligent and thorough
Able to work individually or in a team
Have a personal laptop

Handle administrative duties related to employees

Proficient in operating computer and MS Office
Good knowledge in recruitment process and procedure
Good management skills and capable of multitasking
Detail-oriented and do not mind adminitrative duties

Comfortable in delivering presentation as speakers and business decks for partnership potential
Supporting marketing team for organizing event and able to propose new ideas and plan for event

Have good analytical skills preferably on Digital Marketing

Able to use Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, as well as Adobe InDesign for graphic design is also a plus.
Have at least driving license C, candidates having a certificate as drone pilot is a plus.

Build networks and relations with related stakeholders within the program, be it the government, environmental agency, waste bank association, etc
Acquire the commercial sectors (beverage store and cafe) that generates UBC to participate in the program
requirement: At least a Bachelor's Degree from Environmental Engineering/Communication/Anthropology/Sociology/Economy major
Good knowledge in Project Management
Experienced in Government Relations
Good knowledge regarding waste issues, especially on EPR (Extended Producer Responsibility)
Familiar with the topic of Life Cycle Material

extended-producer-responsibility-officer.title: Extended Producer Responsibility Officer
description: Look for field surveyor
Coordinate the field surveyor
Acquired waste banks to join the InspirACTion program
Create UBC collection scheme (pick-up schedule, the waste collection fleet, etc)
Collect data on the volume of UBC that has been collected
Monitor prizes and the ongoing competition
Take part and monitor the production of public facility using UBC recycled materials
Coordinate the handover of the assistance facility
requirement: At least a Bachelor's Degree from Environmental Engineering/Communication/Anthropology/Sociology/Economy major
Have experience in leading and managing a team
Good knowledge in Project Management
Good understanding about the concept of EPR (Extended Producer Responsibility)
Familiar with the concept of waste bank and materials trading
Have high mobility

admin-pwm.title: Admin PWM
description: Be responsible with the administration affairs of PWM
requirement: At least a graduate from Vocational School of Administration and Accounting
Male/Female max. 25 years old
Live in Bekasi or the surrounding areas (for placement in Bekasi)
Honest, thorough, and neat
Able to work in a team
Have a personal laptop
Good knowledge in Ms.Word, Excel, and PowerPoint

project-development-officer.title: Project Development Officer
description: Record and input sales leads
Perform pitching to new clients
Design project in a form of proposal (project and budget design)
Supervise the marketing strategy
Maintain communication with client and troubleshoot the administration problems during the duration of the project

Proficient at communicating in English
Good ability in creating presentation slides and proposals using Google Slides or Microsoft PowerPoint
Able to operate Excel and understand the function of pivot in Excel
